description: Johnny Hill was astonished at how successful his old buddy Dillon Diaz had become since the last time they saw each other. Dillon was sexy, muscular, rich, and newly single. Johnny couldn't help but want some of what Dillon had, especially what was in his pants. Dillon couldn't help but want more, Johnny's big dick. Watch two old friends, reminisce, laugh, and fuck each other really good when "Old Friends" get together.
title: Old Friends
